    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static TerminalSize.Size
    TerminalSize.get()
    Attempts to get the terminal size using multiple methods.
    Falls back to a default size of 80x24 if all methods fail.
    TerminalSize.Size
    Terminal.getSize()
    Returns the terminal size in columns and rows.
